name: blotjson
description: A module to simplify visualisation of JSON.

scripts.transfer-files: mkdir -p ../../dist/ && cp src/index.js ../../dist/ && cp src/errorMessages.js ../../dist/ && cp package.json ../../dist/
scripts.generate-docs: node docs/docGenerator.js && rm README.md && cat docs/nodejs_header.md >> README.md && cat ../../../docs/common_header.md >> README.md && cat docs/body.md >> README.md && cat ../../../docs/common_footer.md >> README.md
scripts.build: npx prettier --check src/*.js && npx eslint *src/index.js && npm run test-coverage

author: Saad Haider

hooks.pre-commit: npm run fixstyle && npm run generate-docs && git add README.md
